title: Divya Lakshmi Kasu Haaram - A Divine Diamond Embrace
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Kasu Haaram showcases traditional Telugu craftsmanship. The intricately designed 'Kasu' (coin) motifs are pave-set with dazzling diamonds. A central temple design pendant features a miniature Lakshmi idol, hand-carved with remarkable detail, framed by delicate floral filigree. The pendant is further embellished with pear-shaped emeralds and rubies. Dangles of lustrous South Sea Pearls add a touch of classic elegance.
colors: Predominantly gold with brilliant diamond sparkle. Accents of vibrant green (emerald)
and creamy white (pearls) create a rich
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Perfect for Muhurtham attire
or a grand half-saree function (Langa Voni). Also suitable for high-end gala events where a touch of traditional opulence is desired.
description: A timeless heirloom piece embodying the richness of South Indian tradition. The hand-carved Lakshmi idol represents prosperity and blessings. The high-quality diamonds and gemstones ensure lasting brilliance and value. This Haaram is a statement piece that will be treasured for generations. Its versatility allows it to be paired with both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
